QuestData.Title: WANTED: A Black Stalker Egg
QuestData.Description: There is only ever one great mother of the marsh walkers in Zangarmarsh. She is always known as the Black Stalker, and she hatches from one of the eggs left behind when her mother dies.$B$BI have a buyer who is interested in one of those eggs. He mentioned something about adding her as a zoo attraction.$B$BIf you are interested in the reward I am offering, travel to the Underbog and slay the Black Stalker for her egg.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wind Trader Zhareem wants you to obtain a Black Stalker Egg. Deliver it to him in Shattrath's Lower City to collect the reward.$B$BThis quest may only be completed on Heroic difficulty.
QuestData.CompletionText: We're speaking again because you have the egg? Outstanding, let me see it!
QuestData.RewardText: Is it not amazing to feel the life pulsing within the egg? I must hurry to deliver it to the purchaser. We wouldn't want it hatching here now would we?$B$BYour payment is ready.$B$BCome back tomorrow and I will have another request for you to fulfill.
